title: Bike check: The Cannondale SuperSix Evo of Rigoberto Uran and EF Education–EasyPost
content:
Rigo's Cannondale SuperSix Evo ridden for team EF Education-EasyPost is exactly the lightweight climber you'd expect.

Read the full article at Bike check: The Cannondale SuperSix Evo of Rigoberto Uran and EF Education–EasyPost on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
